column4: does anyone know how to remote connect from an xp comp to an ubuntu comp?
<cein> i have vnc on my xp, but how do i configure it? and can it be installed to a removabable drive
<ubuntu-rocks> how do i check for ssh? and can putty be run on removable media?
<ubuntu-rocks> yeah
from synaptic right?
<ubuntu-rocks> youll have to explain this in laymans terms. im still gaining experience with ubuntu
its all part of the fun!
i used to know how to check the amount of memory, but i seem to have forgoten. how do i check?
what?
i have about 256 if i remember right
go to system>administration>system monitor>resources tab
it says i have 250 mb of memory, but it says i have no swap, and i know i made a swap drive
it says there is no swap or no swap is being used?
it says 0 of 0 is being used
now type this in terminal : sysctl -q vm.swappiness
it says  "cannot stat /dev/disk/by-uuid/dd2639df-7999-4f99-9fca-9e492637773a: No such file or directory"
vm.swappiness = 60
ok, done
i know i created one at set-up, i just dont know what happened to it
you should boot with the live cd and check the partitions, something has gone wrong apparently.
my ive cd is 6.06, and i'm on Studio 7.04
ok, thanks man
